```{r}
library(fields)

load("data/dennys.Rdata")
load("data/lq.Rdata")

count = 0
for(i in seq_along(dennys.US[[1]])){
  dist = rdist.earth.vec(matrix(c(as.numeric(dennys.US$long)[i],
                                  as.numeric(dennys.US$lat)[i]),ncol=2),
                         matrix(c(as.numeric(hotels$long),
                                  as.numeric(hotels$lat)),ncol=2),
                         miles=TRUE, 
                         R = 6371)
  if(min(dist) < 1){
    count = count +1
  }
}
count
rate = count/length(hotels[[1]])
rate
```
```{r}
count = 0
for(i in seq_along(hotels[[1]]))
  {
  rad <- pi/180
  a1 <- as.numeric(dennys.US$lat) * rad
  a2 <- as.numeric(dennys.US$long) * rad
  b1 <- as.numeric(hotels$lat)[i] * rad
  b2 <- as.numeric(hotels$long)[i] * rad
  d_long <- b2 - a2
  d_lat <- b1 - a1
  a <- (sin(d_lat/2))^2 + cos(a1) * cos(b1) * (sin(d_long/2))^2
  c <- 2 * atan2(sqrt(a), sqrt(1 - a))
  R <- 3959
  d <- R * c
  if(min(d) < 1){
    count = count +1
  }
}
count
rate = count/length(hotels[[1]])
rate
```
